creator: pvarma@brocade.com
text:
There is a big requirement to have the following tasks:

- if
- while/for
- case

Without these, it becomes ugly to set properties and create new tasks. These are
all ugly workarounds. It is understandable that ant is not a scripting language
but it does not appear to be any worthwhile language if it cannot support
control statements.

creator: peterreilly@apache.org
text: one of the workarounds is to use ant-contrib.

It's reasonable to assume that WONTFIX is the truth.

Alternatives that provide this sort of control structure exist outside of Ant and the Ant developers do not want them inside of Ant's core.
